Edwin L. Cole

  1. Foster Name: Edwin Cole
  2. Foster Family: John and Annie Nealy
  3. Location of Family: Sterling, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Sterling, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 6
  7. Date of Birth: 11/27/1902, Brooklyn, NY
  8. Date of Death: 12/10/1995, Sterling, NE
  9. Gender: male
  10. Source: "Riders of the Orphan Trains: Nebraska," http://www.usgennet.org/usa/ne/topic/trains/riders.htm; Sterling Sun, 9 October 1908.
